alf.reference.rag.title: Source
app.kakao.message.maxAttachmentExceeded: There are files we could not retrieve.
app.messenger.already.referenced.other.c: This messenger account is already linked to another channel.
app.naver_talk_introduction_description: You can directly manage Naver Talk Talk chats and view customers' Naver profiles on Channel Talk.
app.naver_talk_introduction_detail_descr: You can manage Naver Talk Talk chats directly on Channel Talk. It supports file transfers, live chat management, as well as workflows and operating hours. You can also check Smart Store order details linked to Talk Talk. This feature is available for free.
app.naver_talk_introduction_detail_image:
Hi there! I'm Betty from Channel Talk.
It will be available tomorrow. Would you like me to send you a reminder?

Hi!
When will the product be back in stock?
It looks like we have another inquiry about this today.
app_naver_talk_introduction_detail_descr: Through the Channel Talk Home, you can prefetch Naver profiles of customers via Naver Login before starting a Talk Talk chat.

wam.kakao.form.phone_number.helper_text: In the next step, we’ll send a verification code to the above number.

wam.kakao.friend_talk.type.base.descript: This is the basic message type. You can attach images and buttons.
wam.kakao.friend_talk.type.carousel_comm: Display multiple products in a catalog format. You can show product prices and discounts.
wam.kakao.friend_talk.type.carousel_feed: Display multiple updates in a horizontal feed format, with a title and body text.
wam.kakao.friend_talk.type.commerce.desc: You can display a single product in catalog format. You can show the product's price and discount rate.
wam.kakao.friend_talk.type.wide_image.de: A message type that highlights images in a larger format.
wam.kakao.friend_talk.type.wide_list.des: Display multiple updates in a list format.
wam.kakao.friend_talk.type_field.label: Brand Message Type
wam.kakao.friend_talk.type_field.placeho: Please select a brand message type
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.banner.blo: The template has been blocked for abusing reasons. Please contact Kakao Talk for the issue.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.banner.del: Existing templates were deleted when the integration was disconnected. Try editing them or requesting approval again to use them.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.banner.dor: The template has been dormant because it has been inactive for a long time. Please press the cancellation button if you intend to use it again.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.delete_mod: Are you sure you would you like to delete the template? Once deleted, it cannot be recovered.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.form.butto: The invoice number and the carrier company name must be included. Check supported carrier companies
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.form.chara: You can enter up to {{count}} characters.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.form.exten: Please write within 500 characters including url.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.form.main_: Please write within 1000 characters including variable and URL. {Attribute} form of # {Attribute} without spaces.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.form.secur: With security template, message content is not exposed on all sub-devices other than mobile, which is the main device.
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.form.title: Title
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.review_req: (Optional) Please leave the message for the inspector
wam.kakao.info_talk.templates.stop_modal: Locks the template. If you have a campaign that uses that template, it won't work correctly.
wam.kakao.message.estimated_usage_discla: The estimated amount and preview screen may differ from the actual result
wam.kakao.message.modal.title: KakaoTalk Message
wam.kakao.message.type_guide: Please use Info Talk for informational messages and Brand Message for promotional messages. Learn more
wam.kakao.message.upload_preview_error: Failed to upload preview image. Please try again.
wam.kakao.models.content.main_content_pl: Enter the message to be shown to customers
wam.kakao.profile.default_setting.descri: You can select the default profile to use for each service.
wam.kakao.profile.default_setting.title: Default Profile Settings
wam.kakao.profile.feature.cs_talk.descri: You can handle Kakao chats in Channel Talk.
wam.kakao.profile.feature.friend_talk.de: You can send promotional messages to customers who have agreed to receive marketing or who are friends with your Kakao channel.
wam.kakao.profile.feature.info_talk.desc: You can send informational messages, such as order or shipping updates, to customers with a phone number.
wam.kakao.profile.followup.description: Used for chat follow-up notifications, Meet notifications, and Channel X review request Info Talk messages upon delivery completion.
wam.kakao.profile.followup.label: Used for follow-up notifications
wam.kakao.profile.friend_talk_limitation: Currently, Brand Messages can only be sent to Kakao channel friends. We’re working on making them available to more recipients.
wam.kakao.profile.front_home.description: If enabled, this will be displayed on the front home page and can be used as a separate customer inquiry channel. Requires Kakao CS Talk.
wam.kakao.profile.front_home.label: Show on Front Home
wam.kakao.profile.remove_warning.front_o: The option to contact via KakaoTalk on the front home will be removed.
wam.kakao.profile.remove_warning.main: Some related features like marketing and offline follow-ups may stop working.
wam.kakao.profile.remove_warning.notific: Chat follow-up notifications, Meet alerts, and Channel X review request Info Talk (Alim Talk) messages after delivery will no longer function.
wam.kakao.profile.remove_warning.templat: Info Talk (Alim Talk) templates created with this profile can no longer be used.
wam.kakao.profile.remove_warning.workflo: All workflows and marketing set with this profile will be stopped.
wam.kakao.request.failed_error: The requested operation failed. Please check if there are any errors.
wam.kakao.template.invalid_template_erro: A template that is no longer available has been used.
wam.kakao.template.personal_description: Templates that you registered and approved are collected here
wam.kakao.template.recipe_description: Templates pre-registered by Channel Talk. Popular templates are collected here
wam.kakao.variable.chat_info.description: Use chat information as a variables.
wam.kakao.variable.chat_info_description: Select chat profile information such as status, CSAT, etc.
wam.kakao.variable.customer_info_descrip: Select customer profile information such as language, tags, membership level, etc.
wam.kakao.variable.event_info.descriptio: Use event information as a variable.
wam.kakao.variable.event_info_title: Get start event information as variables
wam.kakao.variable.event_information_not: The selectable information varies depending on the start event
wam.kakao.variable.not_selected.descript: If no variable is entered, a default message will be sent.

wam.naver_talk_orders.need_plan_upgrade: Please upgrade your plan to view.
wam.naver_talk_orders.no_talk_chat.descr: You cannot check Talk Talk chats in recent conversations. You can view Naver order details when there are Talk Talk chats.
wam.naver_talk_orders.server_error: A temporary error occurred. Please try again later.
